attributes.action: pressurise the MOD into naming one of the new Royal Navy ships HMS Sheffield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 25 years after the Falklands war it would have been a fitting tribute to the ships and former crews to name the new ships coming into service af the ships that were lost in 1982. The City of Sheffield want a ship named HMS Sheffield not HMS Diamond.
